show_name: Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka??: Dear My Sister
other_title: Is the order a rabbit?? Dear My Sister
ご注文はうさぎですか??～Dear My Sister～
opening_theme: "Happiness Encore (ハピネスアンコール)" by Petit Rabbit's (Ayane Sakura, Inori Minase, Risa Taneda, Satomi Satou, Maaya Uchida)
